header.#text:
Audit of hurricane protection
			 funding and cost estimates

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, in coordination with the National Academy of Engineering, shall conduct
			 and submit to

a full audit of hurricane protection funding and cost
			 estimates associated with post-Katrina hurricane protection.

text.#text:
Not later than 270
			 days after the date of enactment of this Act, the
The purposes of the audit shall be—

to conduct an analysis of resources
			 available and work required with respect to hurricane protection funding and
			 post-Katrina hurricane protection; and

to identify strategies to replenish
			 reprogrammed funding from out-year work to immediate needs.

current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To direct the General Accountability Office to conduct a
		  full audit of hurricane protection funding and cost estimates associated with
		  post-Katrina hurricane protection.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced
			 the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Homeland Security and
			 Governmental Affairs
